Name: The Dead Rooms
About the game: Previously under the title of SYNDER . T̤̦̰̟͉̰̔͐ͫ͘ͅͅh̜̝̭̥̮ͩ̔ͬ̚͟ę̥̯͓̣ͧ͗ͧ ̯̗̝͇̮̗͉̒̍͘D̷͚̙̖͎̖̥͖̣̃̓̑ę̖̰ͣ͑a͍͖͚̤̬ͥ́͆̄͞d̵͕̻̜͚͍̻̱ͯ ͉̞͔̌ͯͩ̾́R̶̬͉͍̭̰̰̻͐ò͇͖̪̫͚̤̹͍̽ͯ͡ő̵͈͍̦͇͔̦m̢̗͉ͥ͊̂s̘̘͕̲̙͙͕͉͋̇͋̓͢ have taken you. Push through, what seems as an enigmatic living dimension extending randomly for eternity. Experience dread and isolation as you navigate a seemingly endless realm of rooms, search for supplies/weapons and maintain your sanity as you hope for an exit. IT'S LIKE THE FIRST TIME, EVERYTIME! The Dead Rooms is ever evolving and adapting, Every run will feature different rooms and layouts + loot, and offer a different playthrough Sometime you may get lucky.. NO MORE WALKING SIMULATORS! The Dead Rooms aims to be an actually game , not just an immersive experience. Featuring survival and roguelite mechanics such as character management and perma death with the chance to find your previous body on your next run! LEVEL VARIETY! As you progress further, The Dead Rooms will feature a variety of rooms featured in The Back Rooms Lore, more being added after release! Below are planned with more on the way! Level 0 - 'The Lobby' Level 427 - 'Infinite Mall' Level 239 - 'Infinite Arcade' Level 974 - 'Kitty's House'
